name: Into the Past (MarcoValeKaz, inestoliveira, Octavius)
description:
In this game, you play against past versions of yourself, as you go deeper and deeper into the past, to challenge your skills.

WASD -> Move 

Space Bar -> Jump

Mouse -> Look 

Mouse Left Button -> Shoot

Try to survive as many waves as possible.

Programing by Ruben Ornelas
Visuals by Marco Vale
Audio by Inês Oliveira
